channel.title: whonixcheck question
channel.description:
sry for the noob question. but better recheck. Should I run whonix check on getewey? or i can check system runs only workstation whonixcheck? (my getewey is in console. whithout Desktop)
TNX!

item.title: whonixcheck question
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Yes, please regularly run Whonixcheck on both the gateway and the workstation.

Have a nice day,

Ego
